channel.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
That thing was badass, kinda fitting into an exciting nightmare, but I don’t cry that it was cut.

Speaking of this video, the security guard in the silo is really cool. As I watched this video I also thought of the trailer of HL beta, it had some great moments as well.

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
mhmc7:

The animator’s at Black Mesa mod could take advantage of the video, put some animations made in the video

More like the other way around, I do believe the mod team were thinking about giving Gordon the ability to drop his glasses at certain points in the game, but that idea was scrapped ages ago. Seems like someone’s been scrounging around on the forums :pirate:

Read full topic
item.source: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
This stuff is really impressive, especially the stuff in Gldsrc.

I’d love it if he made an actual FPS film and explained why Gordon doesn’t talk through people/aliens interupting him ( in comical ways at times ).

Read full topic
item.source: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
FMVs would take away from the idea of seeing everything through the eyes of Dr Freeman, Things like G-Man’s “heart to heart” don’t count because, even though your control is taken away, you’re still seeing everything through Freeman’s eyes.

Things that take you out of Freeman is not Half-Life.

(Crap, I evidently got ninja’d by a full page!)

Read full topic

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: K_amp_955_ON
item.description:
Damn that’s awesome. The hunter/strider clip would be amazing in Half Life 3; cinematic to the point of badassery but still having the feel of the current Gordon animation level in Half Life… Well, aside from the thumbs up.

And the simplistic ladder climbing scene made for a good laugh. I always found it funny Gordon climbed ladders with no hands.

Read full topic

item.source: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
mhmc7:

I agree with you. Some things do not put it in gameplay. but in fact, the introduction until where it appears to put the glasses. it was really as it should be done in cinemastics, showing his vision blurred before using goggles. And I also liked some parts,when he wear the hev suit,animation to move up the ladder,animation as he opens the vent pipe,animation showing the hands pushing the boxes,animation when he jumps,Animation when he runs,Animation when he catches the soldier’s weapon.

But in animation how to use the gun, I found it very strange that would be very bad in gameplay, it would only be good at cinemastics.

What the fuck is wrong with you and why do you insist on double posting AND editing?

Read full topic

item.title: Holy fucking shit!(Animation trailer for half-life)
item.dc:creator: mhmc7
item.description:
Keresh:

No, it would look terrible.

I agree with you. Some things do not put it in gameplay. but in fact, the introduction until where it appears to put the glasses. it was really as it should be done in cinemastics, showing his vision blurred before using goggles. And I also liked some parts,when he wear the hev suit,animation to move up the ladder,animation as he opens the vent pipe,animation showing the hands pushing the boxes,animation when he jumps,Animation when he runs,Animation when he catches the soldier’s weapon.

But in animation how to use the gun, I found it very strange that would be very bad in gameplay, it would only be good at cinemastics.
